tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    dest_ip VARCHAR(255),
    protocol VARCHAR(50),
    payload_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    data_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    ip_address VARCHAR(255),
    mac_address VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  source_ip VARCHAR,
  destination_ip VARCHAR,
  protocol VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    protocol VARCHAR,
    data_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE network_logs (
    log_id SERIAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id SERIAL,
    device_name VARCHAR,
    ip_address VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE network_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    analysis_result TEXT
)
